Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE; PAINTED
Name: Globular bottle
Description: Globular bottle in shape, with a small narrow-mouthed bottleneck, straight rim and convex base with a small groove. The surface has a reddish coating which has been smoothed with a palette knife.The upper third presents a painted decoration consisting of leaves stylized in the shape of a fan, framed by longitudinal lines. On the neck is another line of the same type.
